::Killfest/DarkMouse::

Killfest looks at DrillBit and nods. His missile launcher fires a 
single missile, scrapping the command chair.

"There, now we're all set." He grinns at DrillBit, "Commanders get to 
stand."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DarkMouse nods and walks over to a computer she begins to browse the 
database.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He stands up.
> "There should be a complete list in the comp network," he says to 
Dark
> Mouse.
> He then turns to Killfest.
> "I think we need another chair command chair in here. The ship 
wasn't
> built with co- commanders in mind."
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He flew in to range, opening fire on Angel Prime.
> 
> ::Dollen::
> 
> He waited for StarScream to transform.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He didn't get a reply from Angel Prime. He started to get worried, 
but
> stayed in his seat.
